other_tests.findings: PEEPi of 12 cm H2O; lower inflection point of 14 cm H2O.
other_tests.changes_over_time: After 12 hours of prone positioning, PEEPi was 2 cm H2O, and lower inflection point was 3 cm H2O.

other_tests.findings: Naloxone did not abolish the placebo response.
Degree of pain associated with changes in regional cerebral blood flow in specific brain regions.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Pain ratings decreased with placebo intervention over the 50-day observation period.
